sentences.sContent: At the end of the day, add up the percent DVs.
sentences.sContent_eng: At the end of the day, add up the percent DVs.
sentences.sCn: 在一天结束后，把所有营养素的百分比加起来。

sentences.sContent: Machines are delivering up to only 25 percent of the fuel they combust.
sentences.sContent_eng: Machines are delivering up to only 25 percent of the fuel they combust.
sentences.sCn: 机器的运转效率只能达到所耗燃料的百分之二十五。

sentences.sContent: But there are billions more people out there who are not in the top one percent, and they’re not in the top two or three either.
sentences.sContent_eng: But there are billions more people out there who are not in the top one percent, and they’re not in the top two or three either.
sentences.sCn: 但是还有十亿多的人不在其中，他们不在其中的百分之一，也不再其中的两百分之一或者三百分之一的其中。

sentences.sContent: ...Seventy-four percent of the respondents surveyed report a “good to excellent” expectation of real-estate profitability in 2015...
...E-book sales are up 146 percent over last year...
...while hardback sales increased 6 percent and paperbacks decreased 8 percent...
...as currently nuclear electricity accounts for only 2 percent of the national gross electricity generation...
...Over fifty percent of recent college graduates remain unemployed or unable to fred a suitable job...
...and I see college costs rising faster than inflation up to the mid-1980s by 1 percent a year...
...Now I see them rising 3to 4 percent a year over inflation...

synos.tran: [数]百分比，百分率；部分；百分数

phrases.pCn: 容积百分数，容量百分比；体积百分比

words.tran: 百分率的；按百等分排列的
